title: Google Chrome security advisory (AV25-243)
description: On April 29, 2025, Google published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Stable Channel Chrome for Desktop  versions prior to 136.0.7103.48/49 (Windows/Mac), and 136.0.7103.59 (Linux)
Extended Stable Channel  versions prior to 136.0.7103.48/49 (Windows/Mac)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
